abstract.para: Learn how to install, enable, and update &saptune;.

section.title: Introduction
section.para: Before you proceed, make sure that the requirements listed below are met.

listitem.para: A system on which you plan to run &sap; workloads. The system must have an active SUSE subscription.

section.title: Installing and enabling &saptune;
section.para: To install and enable &saptune; proceed as a follows:

section.title: Troubleshooting
section.para: When installing and updating &saptune;, pay attention to the zypper output to ensure that installation and updates are performed correctly. The output is also saved in /var/log/zypp/history.
As &saptune; is installed as a regular zypper package, refer to Zypper troubleshooting documentation if &saptune; installation or update is failed.
